data.description:
Have you ever been in ***Madeira***? Did you ever saw the beauty that this island can offer? Now you got an opportunity to fast travel there, just by putting your headset on. 

Immerse yourself into ***360 3D videos*** of the nicest locations on the island. Let your headset take you there in ***full 360 3D with spatial audio in max allowed quality***. 
![{"height":1232,"type":"image","width":1640}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974902_927982809158388_8957412374665098034_n.png?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=VOKOSdclvdkQ7kNvgGs00s5&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AQoHYbTJPbPZT4H2RlNtzba&oh=00_AYDc3KTMkSymCHKPbKSmTTP0TUzpVd87C8CLDXcrGKRRhg&oe=66EC0615)

Feel the heights of the cliffs, the beauty of the hills and forests. Relax on a beach, walk along levadas or visit Funchal . 

Listen to a ***narrative voice over description of each location in English, Chinese, German and Portuguese!*** 

![{"height":941,"type":"image","width":2113}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982651_523360926908279_6700606082094410555_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BC_OkJ_nwPQQ7kNvgFxsyyb&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AQoHYbTJPbPZT4H2RlNtzba&oh=00_AYDi6DuccdyO3rFogwg2IOTf6uh42XoEsi_NCNe2iFh4WA&oe=66EC131B)
Currently there are ***73 viewpoints from 21 scenes***, where you can travel.
In each scene (touristic hot spot) you have usually around ***3-7 viewpoints***, where you can immerse yourself into the beauty of Madeira. 
![{"height":1232,"type":"image","width":1640}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75375766_1050616443169233_6173273804500233481_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=qyJ4q6utTz4Q7kNvgEgOAYw&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AQoHYbTJPbPZT4H2RlNtzba&oh=00_AYCc9gIiWzz3nF3ZbgvdgcoizXkL38jStaqUZGBM5AXsgA&oe=66EC1DDE)

List of the included locations:
- ***Pico Areeiro***
- Porto Moniz
- ***Fanal Forest***
- Arco de Sao Jorge
- Ruins of Sao Jorge
- Santana
- Miradouro do Guindaste
- ***Levada do Cadeirão Verde***
- Achada Cruz
- Casas Madeirenses
- Igreja de Nossa Senhora do Monte
- Levada Faja do Rodrigues
- Miradouro Arco de Sao Jorge Pequeno
- Miradouro Farol da Ponta do Pargo
- Miradouro do Pico do Fortim
- ***Monte Palace Tropical Garden***
- ***PR1 trail***
- Praia de Ponta do Sol
- ***Praia do Porto do Seixal***
- ***Ribiera de Janela***
- Capelinha de Nossa Senhora de Fátima
- Cais da Esperança

It might be one of the biggest apps in your headset, but I hope the experience is really worth it. (After in app downloads ***13GB***)

Your next holiday is just a point and click away! 

Enjoy it now!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031330_1702291373898194_9123240253858423261_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=RHMkl9eHluIQ7kNvgEyoD6X&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AQoHYbTJPbPZT4H2RlNtzba&oh=00_AYAdRfZhtRsDTGk31FbVSqrZJSPmsTH_tGtoX2-tWp8OwA&oe=66EBFCCF)

changelog.change_log: - map shows itself always in front of the user after rotating the head
Reduced the initial download size to half, rest is downloaded during the app is running.

!!Major update!!!
- Map is now available on every view/scene by pressing the secondary (B) button on the right controller
now the user does not have to travel back to the "Map Location"
- Bug fix which caused an occasional hiccup by transition between scenes is now fixed
- Internal small bug and performance improvements

- Added Chinese Text translations
- Cosmetics adjustments by English texts

Sometimes a line artifact has been seen, gone now.
Loading text is shown, when a new video takes longer to load.

Fixed the Loading Text between scenes and viewpoints
Changed the controllers to match the Quest 3 controllers

* Tropical Gardens from Funchal added with 10 viewpoints
* Controllers are now labelled
* Secondary button on the right controller now takes the user back to map

Added 4 new locations
- Achada Da Cruz
- Praia da Ponta do Sol
- Capelinha de Nossa 
- Cais da Esperanca 

Adjusted some background sound volumes
Music and voice over can be turned off, video sounds are always playing, even when music is turned off
Some text corrections

* added new location Seixal
* increased the sound of videos, as the voice over and music was louder

* an approved release for app lab
* fixed rotational issues
* English, German, Cinese and Portuguese voice overs added
